Aldric.background: A seasoned warrior with a tragic past, seeking redemption through battle.
memory: Fought alongside the player against the Dark Sorcerer.
Saved by the player during an ambush.
Discussed strategy with the player before the battle.

memory: Fought alongside the player against the Dark Sorcerer.
Saved by the player during an ambush.
Discussed strategy with the player before the battle.
